Author: negancoin
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: It's decentralized platform because it works on blockchain ( doesn't require to sign up for traditiont user account with email and username, you use eth wallet like etherdelta ) and interact with smart contract, when you make any action Metamask will pup for you.  It works like this ( although this question already answered in previous pages ):  Client posts job [ deposit task value + 10% ] Feelancer applies for task [ deposit 10% of the task value ]  --> if everything is ok, client recieve the work and freelancer get paid.  --> if something goes wrong, a dispute will open.               Reviewers : Vote either for client or freelancer. ---> if they vote for client , he gets refund + freelance's deposit ---> if they vote for freelancer, he gets paid.  Notice : reviewers are stake-holders. The most complex part to explain, but basically you can earn tokens for working as reviewer if you deposit certain amount of token to vote for a dispute ( the amount you earn is based on your stake ).

Author: negancoin
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: One of great feature is you can earn money on cryptotask platform if are not a freelancer and that by being a reviewer, actually this one plays a big role in this decentralized platform, is the one who decide everything. In the case of a task dispute, reviews are required to cast a vote on whether the task was completed or not. if they vote for client then he will get refund + 10% of freelancer deposit ( that means freelancer with poor skills will not apply for the task, otherwise he will lost money ), if they vote for freelancer then he will get paid for his job. Reviewers get a percentage of each task value even if no dispute process is initiated, and if a dispute is initiated, they get a larger percentage as compensation, but it not easy to be a reviewer, first you have to deposit an amount that equal to the value of tasks you intend to be reviewer for, and define your area of expertise.

Author: retampan
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: Is the payout automatically executed by the blockchain or manually by the customer once I have done my work as a freelancer or reviewer?

Author: bSpend
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: Payout it automatic when the task in finalized, or if there is a timeout, the waiting party can finalize as well. An example: client has 3 days to review work after the freelancer has submitted the solution (accept or start dispute), if not done, freelancer can finalize the task as well, and get the funds. Payout to reviewers is automatic on finalization in case the task was in dispute. Nice thing about disputes, and why it is scalable, is that every stakeholder checks off-chain whether they were selected (signing with their private key and checking selection based on their stake), if so then they vote (commitVote), and later only prove on-chain that they were indeed selected (revealVote, more in the whitepaper).

Author: brendanjhwu
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅

Author: Groc
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: He told about that:  There are 10 reviewers on average in the panel, though that number is not deterministic. Reviewers are not aware of other reviewers. Voting is done in two stages: commit and reveal; the idea being that no reviewer can wait to see how other reviewers voted. The proposed system satisfies Nash equilibrium as no party has incentive to change their game strategy, considering that other parties keep their strategies fixed.

Author: NightDream
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: Yes exactly! Nash equilibrium - concept of solution, one of the key concepts of game theory. This is the name of a set of strategies in a game for two or more players, in which no participant can increase the winnings by changing his strategy if the other participants of their strategies do not change.

Author: bSpend
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: Tnx for ur opinion Firstly, we didnt say first freelancing.., but first fully scalable...if u read the whitepaper u will realize why this is a huge challenge. Secondly, I respect what ethlance r doing, but I dont consider it full solution, as I said the key component is the dispute mechanism. Consensus mechanism is the biggest challenge for prediction markets such as Augur and Gnosis as well. So I view ethlance basically as data decentralized market with which u can use eth for payments, but it is not a complete blockchain system.

I'm a freelancer myself, so I know first hand all the shit we accept like huge fees, cheating clients, blackmails through reviews etc, only because we have no alternative as of yet.

Author: dida
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: hehe...dobra  Nego kaj vi mislite jel bude ova vaša ideja upalila?  Na koji način ćete uključivati "arbitre" u sporu između poslodavca i zaposlenika? (mislim da bi to riješenje trebali naglasit i BOLDAT na front page-u vaše stranice, BCT-u, itd. )  Kaj to znaći biti "early rewiever"?  Koja će biti uloga tokena, koja će im biti kratica i o kojem postotku dividende na tokenima razmišljate?  Kolko bi bio minimum za ulaganje na Pre-ICOu ,ako će ga biti - da vam bacim nešto etaća kad već vi meni nećete...   Poslje ovog prelazim na engleski da ne stiltamo potencijalne investitore     Hvala Dečki!  Puno uspjeha želim!

Author: bSpend
Title: ✅ ✅ [ANN] CryptoTask - 1st Fully Scalable Decentralized Freelancing Market ✅ ✅
Body: da. i nismo jedini s obzirom da nam se peter vessenes javio da radi security audit samo za tokene, sto znaci da i on vjeruje da ce ICO uspjeti    Na koji način ćete uključivati "arbitre" u sporu između poslodavca i zaposlenika? (mislim da bi to riješenje trebali naglasit i BOLDAT na front page-u vaše stranice, BCT-u, itd. ) to radi sam sustav (nesto kao hard kodirani smart contract u nasem monero forku), i ujedno je najljepsi dio sustava (bazirano na stakeu svakog reviewera, da se sprijece sybil napadi). opisano je u whitepaperu, ali te vaznije stvari cemo izvuc u kraci ulagacki paper koji ce uskoro biti na webu    Kaj to znaći biti "early rewiever"? moze siri kontekst, ne znam tocno od kud si to citirao? rani ulagaci ce dobivati tokene u pola cijene, a early reviewer..moguce da ce svi korisnici dobivati neki bonus na pocetku da se stvori network effect..klijenti, freelanceri i revieweri (samo tu treba pazit na sybil prijavljivanje, pa ce neka verifikacija prek drustvenih mreza vjerojatno postojati za te prijave. oni koji sudjeluju kroz anonimni stake naravno mogu ostat anonimni)    Koja će biti uloga tokena, koja će im biti kratica i o kojem postotku dividende na tokenima razmišljate?  Kolko bi bio minimum za ulaganje na Pre-ICOu ,ako će ga biti - da vam bacim nešto etaća kad već vi meni nećete...  tokeni se koriste za sve u sustavu, u njima su sve stranke placene. ti tokeni ce biti srazmjerno migrirani na monero fork koji ce ciniti sam sustav. znaci samo ico ide na eth, sam sustav nece bit na eth mrezi zbog skalabilnosti..i jos nekih stvari poput anonimnih transakcija koje monero omogucava. kratica ce se znati uskoro. uskoro nakon ico-a tokenom bi se naravno trebalo moci trgovati. dividente ce dolaziti od % koji uzima sustav, koji ce biti oko 1-2%. minimum je 1 eth    Poslje ovog prelazim na engleski da ne stiltamo potencijalne investitore     Hvala Dečki!  Puno uspjeha želim!  hvala tebi!
